Maxima raced away from the very place she was just taken to. 
Returning to the craft that she had crashed in... to talk to 
Wheeljack-X. He had to assist her. He just had to. She felt inferior 
with out her amazing abilities to detect things from long distances. 
Another thing was that she had to get to the Ark. She felt that she 
had to protect it. 

But before she would go to the Ark, she would find these bases. 

Racing a different direction, which seemed forever to her. In her jet 
form, she would be able to cover distances in mere hours. In his 
form, she couldn't. 

Her first task would be to 'convince' Wheeljack to recreate her form. 

Soon enough, she reached the wreckage. Amazing enough, it didn't seem 
that any one had noticed her arrival other than Wheeljack, Ragnar, 
Empath, Windlord & another. Seemed they gave her no thought. Which 
was fine with her. As long as they stayed far from her & left her 
alone. 

"Wheeljack?" She padded inside the wreck. "Wheekjack?!"
